Compatible with iOS 11 and 12

This tweak adds a new layer of security to your device to help the user prevent a situation where his device is stolen. Alerts are sent by SMS or email when a wrong passcode is entered along with information to help finding the device like a picture or its GPS location.

Features:
-Send email using your own email from Mail.app
-Take Picture with Front Camera when a thief enters a wrong passcode or tries to turn off device
-Save pictures to Photo Library (great if you use iCloud Library).
-Set a number of max attempts before taking picture.
-Sends information about the device like Battery Level and Street name where the device is located
-Send an SMS to a set number when a wrong passcode is entered
-Show an Alert when a wrong passcode is entered o someone tries to turn off the device
-More features coming soon

Configure options from Settings app.

- Improved Stability
- Fix Emails not waiting for an active internet connection


- Fix Power Down for some devices
- Fix crash on the Preference Panel
- Fix lag when sending emails
- Rewording in the settings


- Added iCaughtU Server option to send emails
- Dark pictures should be gone now
- iOS11 Support
